statements: SELECT student_name, genetic_data FROM BiologyGenetics WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM BiologyGenetics WHERE inherited_traits = 'brown eyes';
SELECT student_name FROM BiologyGenetics WHERE genetic_data LIKE '%mutation%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, inherited_traits FROM BiologyGenetics ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT inherited_traits FROM BiologyGenetics;
SELECT student_name, genetic_data FROM BiologyGenetics WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM BiologyGenetics WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, inherited_traits FROM BiologyGenetics ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_name FROM BiologyGenetics WHERE inherited_traits IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM BiologyGenetics;
SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT gene_name, trait_type FROM genetic_data ORDER BY trait_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE mutation LIKE '%insertion%';
SELECT id, gene_name FROM genetic_data WHERE trait_type = 'Cancer';
SELECT inheritance_pattern, COUNT(*) AS count FROM genetic_data GROUP BY inheritance_pattern HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT id, gene_name, trait_type FROM genetic_data ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT mutation FROM genetic_data WHERE inheritance_pattern = 'Autosomal Dominant';
SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE trait_type = 'Eye Color' AND mutation LIKE '%point mutation%';
SELECT id, gene_name, inheritance_pattern FROM genetic_data WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, birth_date FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE birth_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GeneticData ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM InheritedTraits WHERE trait_name LIKE 'eye%';
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC, birth_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT student_name, birth_date FROM Students WHERE birth_date >= '1990-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT trait_name FROM GeneticData
SELECT Students.student_name, GeneticData.trait_name FROM Students INNER JOIN GeneticData ON Students.student_id = GeneticData.student_id
SELECT Students.student_name, InheritedTraits.trait_description FROM Students LEFT JOIN InheritedTraits ON Students.student_name = InheritedTraits.trait_name
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC, year_of_study ASC
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, gene_function FROM genes WHERE gene_type = 'protein-coding'
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM traits WHERE dominant_gene IS NOT NULL AND recessive_gene IS NOT NULL
SELECT student_name, major FROM students WHERE year_of_study = 2
SELECT student_name, trait_name, inherited_trait FROM students JOIN analysis_results ON students.student_id = analysis_results.student_id JOIN traits ON analysis_results.trait_id = traits.trait_id
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY year_of_study DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, major, year_of_study FROM students WHERE major = 'Biology' AND year_of_study = 2;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(result_id) AS num_results FROM students LEFT JOIN analysis_results ON students.student_id = analysis_results.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING num_results > 3;

SELECT student_name, gene_name, trait_name FROM students JOIN analysis_results ON students.student_id = analysis_results.student_id JOIN genes ON analysis_results.gene_id = genes.gene_id JOIN traits ON analysis_results.trait_id = traits.trait_id WHERE traits.trait_id = 1;

SELECT trait_id, gene_type, COUNT(result_id) AS num_results FROM traits JOIN analysis_results ON traits.trait_id = analysis_results.trait_id JOIN genes ON analysis_results.gene_id = genes.gene_id GROUP BY trait_id, gene_type ORDER BY num_results DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_gender FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 10;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM Traits WHERE trait_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT student_name, trait_name, trait_value FROM Students JOIN InheritedTraits ON Students.student_id = InheritedTraits.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 10;
SELECT student_name, student_gender FROM Students WHERE student_gender = 'M';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 2;
SELECT Students.student_name, InheritedTraits.trait_value FROM Students INNER JOIN InheritedTraits ON Students.student_id = InheritedTraits.student_id WHERE InheritedTraits.trait_id = 3;
